review: It is about what I expected, the streaming quality is good.Packaging and looks of device/remote were great.Have had issues though; out of the box Netflix would not launch, had to remove and re-add/update.The remote has a cool voice feature that only works with Amazon Prime media. You can't use it to search for Netflix shows/movies. This leaves a awkward search experience, plus getting to Netflix from the home screen could be a bit easier. Simular frustration with YouTube application, has not worked after a couple updates.Looks like Amazon did great with their own hardware and OS but they need to have higher level of quality from third party applications.
